verses.name: Job 9:8
verses.text: Which alone spreadeth out the heavens, and treadeth upon the waves of the sea.

verses.name: Job 9:9
verses.text: Which maketh Arcturus, Orion, and Pleiades, and the chambers of the south.

verses.name: Job 9:10
verses.text: Which doeth great things past finding out; yea, and wonders without number.

verses.name: Job 9:11
verses.text: Lo, he goeth by me, and I see him not: he passeth on also, but I perceive him not.

verses.name: Job 9:12
verses.text: Behold, he taketh away, who can hinder him? who will say unto him, What doest thou?

verses.name: Job 9:13
verses.text: If God will not withdraw his anger, the proud helpers do stoop under him.
